## Problem 1

First, read and tidy the raw data.
```{r problem1_read_tidy}
homicide_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/washingtonpost/data-homicides/master/homicide-data.csv"

homicide_data = 
  read.csv(url(homicide_url), stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  as_tibble()

homicide_data
```
